description: This file defines the 'BoardView' widget and related UI components for rendering a 4x4 grid-based game board with animated tiles, likely for a 2048 game implementation in Flutter.

classes.name: BoardView
classes.description: StatelessWidget that renders the 4x4 game board with animated tiles, handling layout and tile extraction.

classes.name: _GridBackground
classes.description: Represents the static background grid for empty cells with styling.

classes.name: _TilesLayer
classes.description: Contains the stack of animated tiles, sorted for correct z-order during animations.

classes.name: _AnimatedTile
classes.description: Stateful widget managing the spawn and merge animations for individual tiles.

classes.name: _TileView
classes.description: Visual representation of a game tile with color and text styling.

classes.name: _TileColors
classes.description: Provides color schemes based on tile values.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for `BoardView`, handling layout and rendering.

methods.name: _extractTiles
methods.description: Extracts and sorts active tiles from the game board for rendering.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the stack of animated tile widgets with correct order.

methods.name: didUpdateWidget
methods.description: Detects tile state changes for appropriate animations.

methods.name: _playSpawn
methods.description: Triggers scale and opacity animation for tile spawn.

methods.name: _scheduleMergePop
methods.description: Triggers a bounce effect on tile merge.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Wraps a tile in animated opacity and scale for spawn/merge effects.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Creates the visual appearance of a tile with colors and text.
